words.defineEn: able to bring about dangerous or destructive consequences
words.defineVi: có thể mang lại hậu quả nguy hiểm hoặc phá hoại

examples: The archbishop cautioned the cardinal to beware of a man of one book who bases all of his arguments solely on a single reference.

Other cultures align time with cardinal directions, mimicking the path of the sun.
words.defineEn: possessing the quality of being the most important or basic part of something
words.defineVi: sở hữu chất lượng là phần quan trọng nhất hoặc cơ bản của một cái gì đó

examples: But don’t forget that the rise of Trumpism is concomitant with the decline of Clintonism.
words.defineEn: simultaneously occurring with something else as it is either related to it or an outcome of it
words.defineVi: đồng thời xảy ra với một cái gì đó khác vì nó có liên quan đến nó hoặc là kết quả của nó

words.defineEn: producing results that are contrary to what was intended

examples: First, Putin perceives us as weak, feckless, indecisive, slow to respond.

words.defineEn: of no determination, competence, or strength
words.defineVi: không có quyết tâm, năng lực hay sức mạnh

examples: Whether it actually happened is immaterial.

words.defineVi: không có giá trị hoặc liên quan đến tình hình hiện tại

words.defineVi: gần đây đã bắt đầu phát triển, do đó không hoàn thành

words.defineEn: without any significance or importance
words.defineVi: không có bất kỳ ý nghĩa hoặc tầm quan trọng

examples: And my hope is that Trump is that expression of that backlash, and he’s transitory.

Entering a transitory period through the end of 2020, while the U.K. government negotiates international trade deals, the concerns about private American corporations engaging more with the NHS came up during the discussion of the post-Brexit trade talks with the United States.

At the end of the novel, Nick imagines the first European explorers of New York, writing, "For a transitory, enchanted moment, man must have held his breath in the presence of this continent, compelled into an aesthetic contemplation he neither understood nor desired, face to face for the last time in history with something commensurate to his capacity for wonder."
words.defineEn: only continuing for a short stretch of time
words.defineVi: chỉ tiếp tục trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn

examples: After all, what god could fear a trifling weed?
words.defineEn: without any value or importance
words.defineVi: không có bất kỳ giá trị hoặc tầm quan trọng

examples: The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.

words.defineVi: có khả năng dễ dàng được đúc hoặc định hình thành dạng khác

words.defineVi: cảnh báo hoặc chỉ ra rằng một cái gì đó quan trọng, đặc biệt khó chịu, sẽ diễn ra

examples: That’s retrospective inevitability.

words.defineVi: đề cập đến hoặc liên quan đến một sự kiện trong quá khứ

examples: To appease government officials, the industry funded a local recycling pilot project.

words.defineEn: to end or lessen a person's anger by giving into their demands

examples: Traditional attenuated vaccines create long lasting resilience.
but it's the range is reduced a lot because it gets attenuated by the fabric.

examples: Each Eternal has watched civilizations burgeon and die from their domain of Olympia.

The creation of a burgeoning middle-class was a remarkable achievement and a revolutionary step towards a society in which wealth is shared more evenly amongst its citizens.

words.defineEn: to have a rapid development or growth
words.defineVi: để có một sự phát triển nhanh chóng hoặc tăng trưởng

examples: So I have to constrict the range on the inverse tan function.
Constricted by an impassable wall of rock-hard ice at the top, and bedrock at the bottom.

examples: Three years of chaos would culminate in impeachment.

words.defineVi: để ngăn chặn một người làm những gì họ dự định ban đầu

examples: The salad was elevated with a colorful salpicon of roasted vegetables and feta cheese.

You can elevate a simple bowl of fresh fruit by adding a sprinkle of vanilla extract.
You can elevate your tacos by spooning some chili sauce onto the fillings.

words.defineVi: để đưa ra một thứ hạng tốt hơn, vị trí, hoặc điều kiện cho một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

words.defineVi: liên tục qua lại giữa những ý kiến, hành vi, niềm tin rất khác nhau, v.v.

examples: Even with a well-tailored suit, the politician's charisma couldn't overshadow the face that could stop a clock, with his sunken eyes, patchy beard, and receding hairline.
